mapper.sql: problem_id, question_bank_id, problem_title, problem_dimension, create_time, modify_time, status
mapper.select: SELECT p.problem_id, p.problem_dimension, COUNT(p.problem_dimension) as sum FROM problem p WHERE p.question_bank_id = #{questionBankId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY p.problem_dimension
mapper.insert: insert into problem (problem_id, question_bank_id, problem_title, problem_dimension, create_time, modify_time, status) values (#{problemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{questionBankId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{problemTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{problemDimension,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into problem
problem_id,
question_bank_id,
problem_title,
problem_dimension,
create_time,
modify_time,
status,
#{problemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update problem
question_bank_id = #{questionBankId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
problem_title = #{problemTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
problem_dimension = #{problemDimension,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where problem_id = #{problemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update problem set question_bank_id = #{questionBankId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, problem_title = #{problemTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, problem_dimension = #{problemDimension,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where problem_id = #{problemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into problem(problem_id, question_bank_id, problem_title, problem_dimension, create_time, modify_time, status) values
(#{item.problemId},#{item.questionBankId},#{item.problemTitle}, #{item.problemDimension},#{item.createTime},#{item.modifyTime},#{item.status})
